h3.div: Scheduled for Thursday, April 16 at 5:30pm. Follow the link below to view the live stream. The live stream will be secured, requiring a GoSpoilers account, so a username and password will be listed below for you to use to access the live stream.

div.p: Please click on the link to register your child for preschool for the 2020-2021 school year. Your child qualifies if he/she will be four-years-old by July 31, 2020. (You may complete this form even if you've already registered in-person and/or if your child will be completing another year of preschool). Thank you!

div.p: “Grafton Public Schools is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, age, disability or non-disqualifying handicap in its education programs/activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups and employment practices.”
